meanings.sent1: The sulfury rocks in the cave glowed yellow in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The air in the volcano was sulfury and made me cough.

meanings.definition: Having a strong smell or taste of sulfur.
meanings.sent1: The sulfury water from the well made the whole village smell like rotten eggs.
meanings.sent2: The sulfury taste of the soup reminded me of fireworks on a summer night.
meanings.sent3: The sulfury aroma coming from the kitchen made my stomach growl in hunger.
meanings.sent4: The sulfury odor in the air lingered long after the lightning struck.
meanings.sent5: The sulfury flavor of the barbecue sauce was so intense, it made my eyes water.
